body.name: InnoView Laptop Screen Extender 15.6" Dual Monitors Stacked Folding Triple Monitor (Wins/Mac) 1080P Triple Portable Monitor for Laptop 90°/180° Automatic Rotation Black
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Friday, February 16. Order within 3 hrs 16 mins
features: Improving Work Efficiency: The InnoView portable dual-screen monitor expands the workspace, allowing users to simultaneously view multiple documents, applications, or web pages. This helps enhance multitasking capabilities, thereby boosting work efficiency.

Portability: Being portable, users can easily carry the dual-screen monitor to different locations for business meetings, unrestricted by office limitations. Using a Type-C cable, it connects seamlessly to laptops. In a business environment, elegantly displaying data, charts, or presentations with the InnoView dual-screen monitor adds a professional touch, leaving a favorable impression during business meetings.

Innovation: Unlocking six different usage positions for the InnoView dual-screen monitor adds a touch of fun to work and entertainment. Each positioning method has its unique advantages, such as using a vertical orientation for browsing or design, and an arch-shaped setup for collaborative discussions. The dual-screen monitor supports gravity sensing, automatically adjusting the screen orientation based on user positioning.

Ultimate Experience: This InnoView monitor features a crystal-clear 1080p resolution, providing sharp visuals, a wide color palette of 16.7 million colors for vibrant and lifelike images, an IPS screen for wide viewing angles and accurate color reproduction, and built-in speakers for an immersive audio experience. It seamlessly combines high-definition display, color accuracy, viewing angles, and integrated audio, offering an all-in-one solution for an enhanced multimedia experience.

Seamless Integration: The InnoView dual-monitor setup allows users to play games or watch movies on one screen while engaging in chatting, office work, or virtual meetings on the other. This versatility enhances the overall user experience, enabling smooth transitions between entertainment and productivity. Whether immersed in gaming or enjoying a movie on one screen, the other screen serves as a dedicated space for communication and work-related tasks, striking a perfect balance between leisure and professional use.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 23, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Brilliant Colors Displayed

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 25, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Surprisingly great value for home office
reviews.reviewText: I bought a pair of these about a year ago for my home office. Real roll of the dice as I didn’t know anything about them or have any personal experience with the brand, but reviews seemed good. Long story short, I’ve been blown away by how nice they are. Color and brightness are great, decent set of configuration options, and universally arm-mountable. I’ve found that one pair of these gives me all the space I need to work comfortably (it’s also the maximum size my arm mounts will accept). I was worried I may have to buy a third, but 2 is perfect, and I have dozens of windows open for work every day. I’ll also give a big shout out to the durability—they’ve survived a desk migration and an office rearrange with no issues at all, and even a snagged HDMI cable that snapped while my desk was lowering and there’s been ZERO damage to the monitors. At this price point, and for office work on an HD monitor, I’d buy these all over again.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 30, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Great product for the price
reviews.reviewText: This monitor was so easy to set up - the instructions were clear, everything I needed was in the box. Took me about 5 minutes to set up and plug in. I have only used it for work (no gaming yet) but it is super clear and the colors are very nice. I am very glad that I chose this monitor.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 10, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I am verrrrry happy with this monitor. It replaced a Samsung monitor that I've had for several years that was terrific but only had a 60 Hz refresh rate.My only disappointment was the built-in speakers. I have used 2 tin cans and string with better sound than these two speakers have. They are very tinny, have very little range, and forget any base. Better-sounding speakers would hardly eat into the profit margin but could make all the difference in levels of sound satisfaction.Overall, I rated gaming and picture at 5 stars, but only a 4-star rating because the speakers are so cheap that I'm betting they got them for a price somewhere around a dollar. So they lost a star in 'value for the money' by including extremely cheap, poor-quality, speakers.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 2, 2023
reviews.reviewText: This monitor is amazing for its price.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 9, 2023
reviews.reviewText: The screen is crisp and clear. The colors are vibrant. I thought 27 inch is small but it's huge. Maybe because I'm used to 17 inch laptop screens. The sound is ok, but i didn't buy this for sound, there are dedicated speakers for that. I bought it for the screen and it delivered. The sound is lacking in the bass department; it's non-existent. The buttons on the bottom isn't labeled as far as i can tell which makes changing the settings a challenge. Power button on far right, accept is far left, up and down selection buttons are in between.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 9, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Pretty good for the price
reviews.reviewText: No major flaws, could be a bit easier to set up.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on April 11, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars Cannot get the sound to work-No Product Support
reviews.reviewText: Despite having a very simple HDMI connection, the sound will not work on this monitor. No product support available to solve the problem. Followed all of the trouble-shooting in the instructions and online. Wish I had purchased another monitor. Picture quality is great, but without sound, I have to buy another monitor or speakers.
